body:
fyi - not able to reproduce it on my Odroid-C2 

Using tip @ [a65a96](https://github.com/golang/go/commit/5d876e3e2eb3a30a8c66888912cf41785fa65a96), UbuntuMate, GNU gdb (Ubuntu 7.11-0ubuntu1) 7.11 

$ gdb ./testprog

This GDB was configured as "aarch64-linux-gnu".

(gdb) r Breakpoint
Starting program: /root/go/src/runtime/testdata/testprog/testprog Breakpoint
[New LWP 3269]
[New LWP 3270]
[New LWP 3272]
[New LWP 3271]

Thread 1 "testprog" received signal SIGTRAP, Trace/breakpoint trap.
runtime.breakpoint () at /root/go/src/runtime/asm_arm64.s:97
97		BRK
